name: Path of Creation
description:
//Note: in story mode you must find each skill to get to the next level

Warning: this game is difficult

Hello! this is my submition for the first Black Thorn Prod Game Jam. I hope you like the game. Path of creation is about a journey, a representation of a game developer and part of my personal story.

DOWNLOAD THE GAME FOR PC: https://drive.google.com/open?id=1vavRGGBUO9mn40UjTRohcGF9HgHEX4ut

Controls:

Walk : A and D

Aim: with the mouse

Shoot: Left Click

I apologize for some spelling errors, i didnt have much time to fix everything.

I hope you enjoy the game and share it with your friends to learn the path of the developer.   -Loading
